sentences.english: Historical battles, and lots of them, illustrating Alexanders major battles.
sentences.chinese: 新增諸多歷史戰役，囊括所有亞歷山大的主要會戰。

sentences.english: Such meetings couldinclude India and place more emphasis on the environment.
sentences.chinese: 這類會議應將印度囊括在內的同時着重強調環境問題。

sentences.english: What can we include, to make our Father's Day salutations more special?
sentences.chinese: 我們可以囊括進哪些內容使得父親節的致敬更特別呢？

sentences.english: New Zealand Hospitals Online - listings of public and private hospitals, hospital news, conferences, and information on practicing in NZ.
sentences.chinese: 囊括了新西蘭所有公立和私立醫院的名單和信息。

sentences.english: IT IS no small feat to compact any people's history into a single volume.
sentences.chinese: 將任何一個民族的歷史囊括在單卷書中絕非易事。

sentences.english: Of course the first decision to make, in composing the book, was exactly what to include.
sentences.chinese: 當然寫這本書時，首先要考慮的是要囊括什麼內容。

sentences.english: To include all sectors of production and transmission assembly line.
sentences.chinese: 囊括了各行業的生產及裝配輸送線。

sentences.english: Write a mission statement that includes three or four of your top brand attributes.
sentences.chinese: 寫一份囊括你的三四種頂級品牌特徵的目標宣言。

sentences.english: Jean carried off all the prizes in the competition.
sentences.chinese: 大教代表隊囊括了全部乒乓球比賽的獎項。

sentences.english: The college team carried off all the prizes of the table tennis.
sentences.chinese: 大教代表隊囊括了全部乒乓球比賽的獎項。

sentences.english: "Saint outside the King" the term includes all of the Chinese academic.
sentences.chinese: “內聖外王”一詞，囊括中國學術之全體。

sentences.english: Cooked through years of development, institutions expand the scope of business includes passion.
sentences.chinese: 歷經熟年的發展，機構業務範圍囊括激情拓展。

sentences.english: Their players cleaned up in all the track-and-field events.
sentences.chinese: 他們的運動員囊括田徑運動賽的全部錦標。

sentences.english: African runners swept the medals in the distance events.
sentences.chinese: 在中長跑比賽中，非洲選手囊括了所有的獎牌。

sentences.english: This clause, he says, captures all the little "doodads".
sentences.chinese: 這條因果，他說，囊括了所有的“小擺設”。

sentences.english: The book captures the highlights of her 20 years of pioneering research on positive emotions.
sentences.chinese: 這本書囊括了她20年來對積極情緒的尖端研究。

definition: to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
to span/to stretch across/to travel across
to cover the whole (area)/to be found throughout
to skim (through a book)/to read cursorily/to dip into
